title: Should I buy Vi?
body:
I am nearing 6300 IP (I have 5686) and I am looking for a fun Champ to play, (and no! no{{champion:83}} or {{champion:6}} )
I am looking at {{champion:254}} due to her amazing kit, great ult, nice AOE Dmg ETC. so put your suggestions in on whether I should buy {{champion:254}} or maybe any other suggestions.

replies.body:
Hey there Neo,

I'm only going to give you my assessment of Vi as a champion and not say whether or not you should buy her due to the fact that I lack the knowledge of your play style. So here's my position on Vi.

Vi is an exceptionally fun champion and I think she is one of the better Junglers out there. She has two amazing gap closers with an exceptional amount of damage without even needing to build damage. Her ult is extremely useful and will certainly turn the tables of a game in your favour.

Good luck!

Regards,
EuVee [@euveeLoL](http://www.twitter.com/euveelol)
Just saying I am a casual LOL player, I'm only lvl 29 and not really into winning games all the time.
